files.title: 3D Printed Phone Stand
files.description: Create a custom phone stand using a 3D printer.
files.author: John Doe
files.instructions: 1. Design the phone stand using CAD software. 2. Export the design as a .stl file. 3. Load the .stl file into the 3D printer software. 4. Print the stand. 5. Sand the edges to smooth them.

files.title: Garden Bench
files.description: Build a wooden bench for your garden.
files.author: Jane Smith
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood planks to the required sizes. 2. Assemble the bench frame using wood glue and nails. 3. Attach the seat and backrest planks. 4. Sand the bench to smooth the surface. 5. Apply a coat of varnish for protection.

files.title: LED Light Box
files.description: Create an LED light box for photography.
files.author: Alex Johnson
files.instructions: 1. Cut the foam board to form the box. 2. Assemble the foam board pieces using hot glue. 3. Attach the LED strips inside the box. 4. Solder the wires to the LED strips. 5. Connect the wires to a power source.

files.title: Wooden Coasters
files.description: Make custom wooden coasters with a wood burner.
files.author: Emily Davis
files.instructions: 1. Sand the wood slices to smooth the surface. 2. Use the wood burner to create designs on the coasters. 3. Let the wood burn designs cool. 4. Apply a coat of varnish to protect the wood. 5. Let the varnish dry completely.

files.title: Plant Pot
files.description: Create a custom plant pot with concrete.
files.author: Michael Brown
files.instructions: 1. Mix the concrete according to the instructions. 2. Pour the concrete into the plastic molds. 3. Let the concrete set and cure. 4. Remove the plant pot from the mold. 5. Sand the edges to smooth them and paint as desired.

files.title: Bookshelf
files.description: Build a custom bookshelf for your home.
files.author: Sophia Martinez
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood planks to the required sizes. 2. Assemble the bookshelf frame using screws. 3. Attach the shelves. 4. Sand the bookshelf to smooth the surface. 5. Apply wood stain for a finished look.

files.title: T-shirt Printing
files.description: Design and print your own custom t-shirt.
files.author: Daniel Wilson
files.instructions: 1. Create your design on the computer. 2. Print the design onto transfer paper. 3. Cut out the design from the transfer paper. 4. Place the design onto the t-shirt and iron it on. 5. Add fabric paint details if desired.

files.title: Picture Frame
files.description: Build a custom picture frame from wood.
files.author: Olivia Anderson
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood planks to the required sizes for the frame. 2. Assemble the frame using nails. 3. Insert the glass pane. 4. Sand the frame to smooth the surface. 5. Apply varnish for a finished look.

files.title: Solar Oven
files.description: Create a solar oven for cooking using the sun's energy.
files.author: Ethan Lee
files.instructions: 1. Cut a flap in the top of the cardboard box. 2. Line the inside of the box with aluminum foil. 3. Paint the outside of the box black. 4. Cover the flap with plastic wrap. 5. Position the flap to reflect sunlight into the box.

files.title: Resin Keychains
files.description: Create custom keychains using resin.
files.author: Ava Hernandez
files.instructions: 1. Mix the resin according to the instructions. 2. Pour the resin into the keychain molds. 3. Add glitter or other decorations. 4. Let the resin cure completely. 5. Attach the keychain rings.

files.title: Candle Making
files.description: Make your own scented candles.
files.author: Liam Moore
files.instructions: 1. Melt the wax in a double boiler. 2. Add essential oils for scent. 3. Place the wick in the candle mold. 4. Pour the melted wax into the mold. 5. Let the wax cool and harden.

files.title: Pet Bed
files.description: Sew a custom pet bed for your furry friend.
files.author: Charlotte Martinez
files.instructions: 1. Measure and cut the fabric to the desired size. 2. Sew the fabric pieces together, leaving one side open. 3. Stuff the bed with the filling material. 4. Sew the open side closed. 5. Add any decorative elements as desired.

files.title: Terrarium
files.description: Create a mini garden terrarium.
files.author: Jack Robinson
files.instructions: 1. Clean the glass container. 2. Add a layer of pebbles at the bottom. 3. Add a layer of soil on top of the pebbles. 4. Plant the small plants in the soil. 5. Decorate with additional pebbles or small figurines.

files.title: Chalkboard Sign
files.description: Make a custom chalkboard sign for your home.
files.author: Mia Thompson
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood plank to the desired size. 2. Sand the edges to smooth them. 3. Apply chalkboard paint to one side of the wood. 4. Let the paint dry completely. 5. Write your message on the chalkboard with chalk.

files.title: Bluetooth Speaker
files.description: Build a custom Bluetooth speaker.
files.author: Noah White
files.instructions: 1. Install the Bluetooth module inside the wooden box. 2. Solder the wires from the module to the speakers. 3. Secure the speakers inside the box. 4. Connect the power supply to the module. 5. Test the speaker to ensure it works.

files.title: Wall Art
files.description: Create custom wall art using string and nails.
files.author: Lucas Harris
files.instructions: 1. Paint the wooden board as desired. 2. Draw your design on the board. 3. Hammer nails into the board along the design lines. 4. Wrap the string around the nails to form the design. 5. Trim any excess string.

files.title: Birdhouse
files.description: Build a birdhouse for your garden.
files.author: Benjamin King
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood planks to the required sizes. 2. Assemble the birdhouse using nails. 3. Drill a hole for the bird entrance. 4. Sand the edges to smooth them. 5. Paint the birdhouse as desired.

files.title: Laptop Stand
files.description: Build a custom laptop stand from wood.
files.author: Ella Scott
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood planks to the required sizes. 2. Assemble the stand using screws. 3. Sand the edges to smooth them. 4. Apply wood stain for a finished look. 5. Let the stain dry completely.

files.title: Wind Chimes
files.description: Create custom wind chimes for your garden.
files.author: James Taylor
files.instructions: 1. Cut the metal tubes to different lengths. 2. Drill holes at the top of each tube. 3. Attach the tubes to the wooden ring with string. 4. Secure the string knots. 5. Hang the wind chime in your garden.

files.title: Desk Organizer
files.description: Build a custom desk organizer from wood.
files.author: Grace Baker
files.instructions: 1. Cut the wood planks to the required sizes. 2. Assemble the organizer using nails. 3. Sand the edges to smooth them. 4. Apply varnish for a finished look. 5. Let the varnish dry completely.
